structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
GENERAL PROVISIONS APPLICABLE TO COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

text.section: The council shall meet at least four (4) times each year at the times it determines by resolution. Special meetings may be called by the chairperson. Upon the request of three (3) members of the council, the chairperson shall call a special meeting.
Notice of each meeting shall be given by the chairperson at least ten (10) days prior to the time of the meeting, unless all members of the council waive notice.

law.history: Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 5, effective July 14, 1992.
